publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3093# Mr Duncan Hamilton: Continuing Crisis in Rural Healthcareâ€”That the Parliament notes with concern the decision of Dr Peter Joiner to leave his general practice in Lybster, Caithness; expresses concern at his description of the intolerable pressures placed on single GP practices in remote and rural areas; further notes the pattern of recent GP resignations in Helmsdale and Argyll; regrets the inactivity of the Scottish Executive in tackling this issue, and supports immediate remedial action to avoid further resignations and retirements in Scotland.

S1M-3093# Mr Duncan Hamilton: Continuing Crisis in Rural Healthcare-That the Parliament notes with concern the decision of Dr Peter Joiner to leave his general practitioner practice in Lybster, Caithness; expresses concern at his description of the intolerable pressures placed on single GP practices in remote and rural areas; further notes the pattern of recent GP resignations in Helmsdale and Argyll; regrets the inactivity of the Scottish Executive in tackling this issue, and supports immediate remedial action to avoid further resignations and retirements in Scotland.
